course_details: Learn the basics of Python programming, including variables, loops, and functions.
Build dynamic web applications using Java and popular frameworks like Spring Boot.
Master JavaScript to create interactive and responsive user interfaces for web applications.
Explore the world of machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis using Python.
Create cross-platform mobile apps using React Native, the popular JavaScript framework.
Design and develop exciting games using C++ and game development engines.

course_title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java
course_details: Master essential data structures and algorithms to solve complex coding problems efficiently.
Learn the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to build web applications from scratch.
Discover the world of DevOps, automation, and CI/CD pipelines to streamline software development.
